enhancements.original: Chennai,Tamil Nadu   |  amaan.s.udeen@gmail.com | LinkedIn - Amaan Udeen
enhancements.enhanced: Chennai, Tamil Nadu | amaan.s.udeen@gmail.com | LinkedIn: Amaan Udeen
enhancements.reason: Standardized formatting for location and LinkedIn profile for improved professionalism and readability.

enhancements.original:
Aspiring Data & AI professional skilled in Python, Machine Learning, and Power BI with a strong foundation
in analytics, visualization, and automation. Passionate about transforming raw data into actionable insights
through AI models and interactive dashboards to support data-driven decision-making.
enhancements.enhanced: Seeking an entry-level Data Scientist or AI Analyst role to leverage proven expertise in Python, Machine Learning, and Power BI for optimizing business processes and driving data-driven decision-making. Eager to apply skills in ML forecasting and AI-powered OCR, building on experience reducing shortages by 25% and manual data entry by 70%, to deliver actionable insights.
enhancements.reason: Made the objective specific to a desired role, highlighted key skills directly linked to project achievements, and articulated the value proposition, addressing ATS feedback regarding a generic objective.

enhancements.original: Programming & Analytics: Python, Java, C, MySQL
enhancements.enhanced: Programming & Analytics: Python (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, NLTK, Statsmodels), C, SQL (MySQL)
enhancements.reason: Removed unsupported skill (Java) and specified Python libraries directly used in projects, providing context and evidence for claims, which improves ATS compatibility and trustworthiness.

enhancements.original: AI & Machine Learning: Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Pandas, NumPy, OpenCV, Hugging Face
enhancements.enhanced: AI & Machine Learning: Scikit-learn, OpenCV, NLTK
enhancements.reason: Removed unsupported skills (TensorFlow, Hugging Face) and relocated Pandas/NumPy to Programming & Analytics for clarity, aligning skills with explicit project usage.

enhancements.original: Data Visualization & Reporting: Power BI, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Google Colab
enhancements.enhanced: Data Visualization & Reporting: Power BI, Matplotlib, Seaborn
enhancements.reason: Removed Google Colab (a platform, not a visualization tool) to focus on core visualization skills demonstrated in projects.

enhancements.original: Tools & Platforms: GitHub, Visual Studio Code, Google Cloud Vision API
enhancements.enhanced: Tools & Platforms: GitHub (Version Control), Google Cloud Vision API, Visual Studio Code
enhancements.reason: Added context for GitHub to specify its application and improve clarity.

enhancements.original: Soft Skills: Leadership, Problem-Solving, Communication, Team Management, Analytical Thinking
enhancements.reason: Removed generic soft skills list as recommended by ATS; these skills are more impactful when demonstrated through specific achievements and project descriptions.

enhancements.original:
Developed an ML-driven demand forecasting system to predict medicine stock levels, reducing shortages
and overstock by 25%.
enhancements.enhanced: Engineered an ML-driven demand forecasting system, accurately predicting medicine stock levels and reducing both shortages and overstock by 25% for optimized inventory management.
enhancements.reason: Used a stronger action verb ('Engineered'), added 'accurately,' and clarified the business impact ('for optimized inventory management') without inventing new metrics.

enhancements.original: Implemented ARIMA, SARIMA, and XGBoost models for trend analysis and forecasting.
enhancements.enhanced: Successfully implemented and evaluated ARIMA, SARIMA, and XGBoost models to conduct robust trend analysis and generate precise demand forecasts.
enhancements.reason: Used stronger action verbs ('Successfully implemented and evaluated,' 'generate precise') and added 'robust' to enhance the description of the analysis.

enhancements.original: Designed interactive Power BI dashboards to visualize demand trends and model accuracy.
enhancements.enhanced: Designed and deployed interactive Power BI dashboards, enabling stakeholders to visualize critical demand trends and monitor model accuracy for informed decision-making.
enhancements.reason: Added 'deployed' and emphasized user enablement ('enabling stakeholders... for informed decision-making') to highlight broader impact and value.

enhancements.original: Tools: Python, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Statsmodels, Power BI
enhancements.enhanced: Tools: Python (Pandas, Scikit-learn, Statsmodels), Power BI
enhancements.reason: Grouped Python libraries for consistency with the revised 'Skills' section and improved readability.

enhancements.original:
Built an automated document processing pipeline to extract and organize text from invoices, reducing
manual data entry by 70%.
enhancements.enhanced: Developed and deployed an automated document processing pipeline that efficiently extracts and organizes critical text from invoices, reducing manual data entry by 70% and streamlining operational workflows.
enhancements.reason: Used stronger action verbs ('Developed and deployed'), added 'efficiently' and 'critical,' and emphasized business value ('streamlining operational workflows') without inventing new metrics.

enhancements.original: Integrated Google Cloud Vision API with OpenCV for OCR and preprocessing.
enhancements.enhanced: Seamlessly integrated Google Cloud Vision API with OpenCV to perform optical character recognition (OCR) and advanced image preprocessing.
enhancements.reason: Added 'Seamlessly' and 'advanced image' for a stronger description of the integration and process.

enhancements.original: Used NLP techniques (NLTK) for text cleaning and key-entity extraction.
enhancements.enhanced: Applied natural language processing (NLP) techniques, specifically NLTK, for effective text cleaning and accurate key-entity extraction.
enhancements.reason: Clarified 'NLP techniques' and added 'effective' and 'accurate' to describe the quality of outcomes.

enhancements.original: Designed a structured output format compatible with business reporting tools.
enhancements.enhanced: Architected a structured output format, ensuring seamless compatibility with various business reporting tools for enhanced data utilization.
enhancements.reason: Used a stronger action verb ('Architected'), added 'seamless' and 'various,' and clarified the benefit ('for enhanced data utilization').

enhancements.original: Tools: Python, Google Cloud Vision API, OpenCV, NLTK, Pandas, NumPy, Power BI,
enhancements.enhanced: Tools: Python (NLTK, Pandas, NumPy), Google Cloud Vision API, OpenCV, Power BI
enhancements.reason: Grouped Python libraries for consistency with the revised 'Skills' section and improved readability.

enhancements.reason: Standardized format, included the institution, and updated the date format to 'Present' for ongoing study, as per ATS recommendations for clarity.

enhancements.enhanced: CGPA: 8.41
